ygData.subject: New Merchant - Spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: Some minor new info for everyone. After the patch there is now a Merchant that sells Star Rubies, Fire Emeralds, and Sapphires as part of her normal items. It
ygData.messageBody:
Some minor new info for everyone. After the patch there is now a Merchant
that sells Star Rubies, Fire Emeralds, and Sapphires as part of her normal
items.

It is M. Sparkle. She is located in West Commonlands in the small hut right
outside Befallen.

Prices are as follows:

Star Rubies - 156 plat
Fire Emeralds - 204 plat
Sapphires - 240 plat

Hope this helps someone.

Charles
Xezol - Lvl 14 Dwarf Paladin on Prexus
Xezol - Lvl 15 Gnome Mag on E'Ci

Visit My EverQuest Page; including zone maps, trade skill guides, general
weapons info, and more:
http://www.dubuque.net/~sirkal/
